The couple has managed to get into the spotlight after paps clicked them exiting from a cafe in Bandra. Whether it was a date or not, it's difficult to decode but the way Arjun shielded Malaika from the photographers and the crowd was indeed chivalrous and sweet! Have a look at the pictures.
Victoria Beckham, who won't be a part of it, has sent the rest of her former bandmates love and luck for the shows. "I won't be joining my girls on stage again but being in the Spice Girls was a hugely important part of my life and I wish them so much love and fun as they go back on tour next year," Beckham posted on Instagram, reported eonline.com.
